variables will control the different sections of the modular notifications\n\t//Subject will also control the email subject, don\u0027t include HTML there\n\tvar notification \u003d new ModularNotificationsBuilder();\n\t\n\t//URL that can be universally used for viewing a ticket on the portal\n\tnotification.table \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.table3;\n\tnotification.documentID \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.document_id;\n\tnotification.setGlobalUrl();\n\tnotification.action \u003d \u0027custom\u0027;\n\tvar link \u003d notification.globalURL;\n\t\n\t//Email subject and subject section\n\tnotification.subject \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.subject1;\n\t\n\t//User\u0027s first name\n\tnotification.name \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.name;\n\t\n\t//Information section\n\tnotification.information \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.information;\n\t\n\t//variables section\n\tnotification.varList \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.varList;\n\t//More information section\n\tnotification.moreInformation \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.more_information;\n\n\t//Put it all together to get the full HTML template\n\tvar html \u003d notification.getHTML();\n\t\n\t//Print HTML to the body\n\treturn html;"}}</script><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-04
